dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So this forum, it's basically just a big, uh, celebration of Kazakhstan's economy, right? All good news.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So this forum, it's basically just a big, uh, celebration of Kazakhstan's economy, right? All good news.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the forum Martijn Peeters, PwC Advisory Services Partner, will give a speech on topical theme How to grow in these challenging times. Martijn Peeters. Martijn will disclose such kind of issues as decrease of oil prices and weakening economies, increasing costs and shrinking revenues...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What? No! That's, that's completely wrong. Martijn Peeters is talking about challenging times.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? No! That's, that's completely wrong. Martijn Peeters is talking about challenging times.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the forum Martijn Peeters, PwC Advisory Services Partner, will give a speech on topical theme How to grow in these challenging times.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Challenging, shmallenging. It's PwC, they just put a positive spin on everything, like, "Oil prices are down, but that's fine!"
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Challenging, shmallenging. It's PwC, they just put a positive spin on everything, like, Oil prices are down, but that's fine!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, he's explicitly talking about an "unprecedented decrease," geopolitical shifts. And, um, weakening European economies. It's pretty dire.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, he's explicitly talking about an unprecedented decrease, geopolitical shifts. And, um, weakening European economies. It's pretty dire.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Martijn will disclose such kind of issues as decrease of oil prices and weakening economies...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Dire for who? Kazakhstan's got its IT sector, though. That's, like, booming.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dire for who? Kazakhstan's got its I T sector, though. That's, like, booming.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He's also discussing AI's impact on global employment. Including Kazakhstan's IT sector. It's not all sunshine and, uh, rainbows.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He's also discussing A I's impact on global employment. Including Kazakhstan's I T sector. It's not all sunshine and, uh, rainbows.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Martijn will disclose such kind of issues as decrease of oil prices and weakening economies, increasing costs and shrinking revenues, what does adaptation to the new normal mean, why focus on efficiency becomes crucial for success, how can Kazakhstan adapt to the present economic situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But they're pushing lean manufacturing! An Almaty pilot, that sounds pretty effective, you know? A success.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they're pushing lean manufacturing! An Almaty pilot, that sounds pretty effective, you know? A success.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A "highly-successful pilot program" is what it says. What about the "shrinking revenues" and "increasing operational costs"? He's outlining how to adapt, not saying they are adapted.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A highly-successful pilot program is what it says. What about the shrinking revenues and increasing operational costs? He's outlining how to adapt, not saying they are adapted.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Martijn will disclose such kind of issues as ... increasing costs and shrinking revenues, ... how can Kazakhstan adapt to the present economic situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: By looking at Scandinavia! Sustainable development, foreign investment zones. That's, uh, visionary.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: By looking at Scandinavia! Sustainable development, foreign investment zones. That's, uh, visionary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Visionary, or completely unrealistic for this economic downturn? Scandinavian resilience isn't exactly transferable, is it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Visionary, or completely unrealistic for this economic downturn? Scandinavian resilience isn't exactly transferable, is it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Why not? They're talking about attracting investment, setting up new Special Economic Zones. It's a strategy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Why not? They're talking about attracting investment, setting up new Special Economic Zones. It's a strategy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a proposed strategy, for "all these questions," not answers. There's a difference, um, a huge one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a proposed strategy, for all these questions, not answers. There's a difference, um, a huge one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The answers for all these questions you will get during the forum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You're just, you're always so negative.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're just, you're always so negative.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm realistic. You're, like, completely missing the point.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm realistic. You're, like, completely missing the point.
